CustomField.description: Determines how persistent the toast is. Valid values are: dismissible (default), remains visible until you click the close button or 3 seconds has elapsed, whichever comes first; pester, remains visible for 3 seconds and disappears automatically. No close button is provided; sticky, remains visible until you click the close button.
